narrative.title: 7Th Armoured Division - 1940Q4
narrative.situation: British armoured_division deployed in North Africa during 1940Q4.
narrative.objectives: Primary mobile striking force for Operation Compass offensive against Italian 10th Army
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

supply.notes: Operational tempo during Operation Compass - supply lines stretched during rapid advance

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Night movement and navigation in desert
